text:
Gigantic Design Co. | Front End Developer | HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery | US | REMOTE OR ONSITE, FULLTIME, http://www.giganticdesign.com

Gigantic Design Co. is a digital branding agency.

Growing creative agency looking for experience writing semantic, modular front-end code using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, and JQuery. Understanding the concepts of mobile first design and development are highly encouraged. Experience with Sass and ExpressionEngine are a plus.

This position can be onsite and the Dubuque, IA studio or remote based.

At this time we cannot consider candidates from outside the US.

Email me at marnierobbins@hrcreativedesign.com for information or to apply.
